subject: p11879886
History: -year-old woman with congestive cardiac failure, pneumonia, now continued to spike fevers despite antibiotics.
Findings: Sternotomy wires are midline and intact. Bilateral interstitial edema has decreased since the most recent prior examination. Cardiomegaly is stable. Minimal opacification right lung base concerning likely related to infection or edema is improved compared to the prior examination.
